DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine method well treatment femoral fracture child outcomes .
DOC.brief_title: Titanium Elastic Nailing Versus Hip Spica Cast Treatment Femoral Fractures Children
DOC.detailed_description: There consensus treatment close femoral shaft fracture child 6-12years old . We aim compare hip spica cast titanium elastic nailing ( TEN ) treatment femoral shaft fracture child .
DOC.criteria: patient 612 year old femoral shaft fracture without exclusion criterion Segmental , Winquist type III IV comminute fracture , previously diagnose neuromuscular disease ( e.g. , cerebral palsy ) , metabolic bone disorder ( e.g . osteomalacia ) , pathological fracture .
